short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts Epic token when you click the icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Epic / IPFS Link - SSO Integration extension is used to integrate your login process between Epic and IPFS Link. With this extension installed, IPFS Link will not require a separate login given that you are logged into Epic. After installing the extension, no further action is required to set up the integration.
